title: Stuck in an ended game...
body: Not the first time its happened but i dont see anyone else complaining so im worried if its just me i finished a game where the enemy team forfeited and stats didnt load so i skipped now its saying i abandoned a game so i tried to connect and it dosent let me.... now im here...

replies.body: Looking into this, I don't see any leaves for quite a bit, so everything looks okay.  It sounds like the match ended but our servers didn't receive notification that it finished.  Usually a relog or waiting it out can fix that.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
